column4: Why is Ubuntu based on the Debian distribution rather than another ?
cuz debian is better than any other...
everything except release cycle and ease of use... Ubuntu tries to fix these things...
well i m not the defender of any distro, but could you give me some arguments
what is the advantage of .deb over .rpm ?
honestly, if you are not interested enough to do your own research, stick to rpm though  :/
no, I have heard it spoken though...
it sounds like french as it derives from it and other languages such as spanish an english
ugh, why didn't you just say that then?  ;)
you can see kreyol as french with phonetic spelling
i.e. the sound o can be written "o", "au", or "eau" etc.. :-)  whereas in kreyol it is mainly "o"
